name: 黃榮堂
objective:
先修課程：負責教授同意。力系的平衡、摩擦、面積與質量慣性矩、結構分析、虛功法。
Equivalent Systems of Forces, Static Equilibrium ,Area And Mass Moments of Inertia, Analysis of Structures, Methods of Virtual Work.
schedule:
藉由本課程了解工程力學中靜力學之各項定理，並以常見之結構問題為例，實際應用各定理。本課程包含：簡介、向量運算、力、力矩、平衡方程式、等效力系、粒子平衡、剛體平衡、分散力系、形心及質心、結構應用、桁架、樑及纜繩。
W1. Introduction
W2-W4. Statics of particles (plane)
W5-W6. Statics of particles (space)
W7-W8. Rigid bodies: Equivalent systems of forces
W9. Midterm exam
W10-W11 Rigid bodies: Equivalent system of forces
W12-W14. Equilibrium of rigid bodies
W15-W17. Analysis of structures
W18. Final exam
materials:
教科書: 
Vector Mechanics for Engineers: Statics (10th edition, 導讀版), By Beer , Johnston & Mazurek / 莊嘉陽導讀，滄海書局

Engineering Mechanics: Statics (15th edition in SI units), by Hibbeler, 高立圖書
